instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A2179: What is A2179? A2179 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2020 with EMC 3302, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-01958..

threads.title: Macbook Air <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2179</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2020 boot loop
threads.message:
Hello
Dont know what to do with this one. No sign of waterdamage. Boots to apple logo then shuts off and boot to logo again. Just looping. 

Tryed recovery mode but nothing happens
internet recovery mode loads then shuts off before starting
Recovery from USB shuts down when loading

AHT no problems
Target disk mode works.

threads.title: Macbook Air <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2179</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2020 boot loop
threads.message:
Save data in Target Disk mode (if important) and do DFU restore.
Revive not always helps.

Remove audio board and check for liquid sign on both sides.

threads.title: Macbook Air <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2179</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2020 boot loop
threads.message: Cant even get it to go to DFU mode =(

threads.title: Macbook Air <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2179</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2020 boot loop
threads.message: Did you exactly follow the steps from DFU tutorial?

threads.title: Macbook Air <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2179</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2020 boot loop
Macbook Air <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A2179</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> 2020 boot loop
threads.message:
It appears as Recovery in AC2, or not recognized at all?

You can try forcing <SIGNAL>SOC_FORCE_DFU</SIGNAL> signal to <SIGNAL>1V8_SLPS2R</SIGNAL> momentary.
Shouldn't need the charger for this; 5V from the other machine is good enough.
